bangudesc:
la sutysisku is a fast English - Brazilian Portuguese dictionary.

- Can I use it if I lose internet access?
- Yes, if this happens try opening this very address from this browser.
It should still open. A latest version of Chrome, Safari or Firefox is required.
For more resources visit Lojban Wiki.
siskudescr: Search the English - Brazilian Portuguese dictionary la sutysisku.
opdescr: A dictionary for English, Brazilian Portugese, Lojban and other languages that can work offline.
